Passion. Beauty. And lots of Hardware. Supporting tagline

via youtube.com

A french director has sought to bring the passion and glory of racing at the Nurburgring circuit to life on the big screen. Based on this HD preview on YouTube, I'd say the director's vision is well on its way to bringing this iconic circuit to a wider audience.
